FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: “I have seen life’s purpose, and now it is my own.” —Kamahl, druid acolyte
« Je connais le but de la vie, je connais donc le but de ma vie. » —Kamahl, acolyte druide
“He visto el propósito de la vida, y ahora lo he hecho mío“. —Kamahl, acólito druida
„Ich habe den Zweck des Lebens erkannt, und ihn für mich übernommen.“ —Kamahl, Druidennovize
“Ho compreso lo scopo della vita e ora è anche il mio.” —Kamahl, accolito druido
「私は生命の目的を見てきた。今やそれは私と共にある。」 —ドルイドの見習いカマール
“나는 삶의 목적을 배웠으니 그 목적대로 살 것이다.” —초보 드루이드 카말
«Я узнал цель жизни. Теперь это моя цель». — Камал, священник друидов
“Vi o propósito da vida, e agora é o meu próprio.” — Kamahl, acólito druida

SPELL_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Each player’s life total becomes the number of creatures he or she controls.
Le total de points de vie de chaque joueur devient égal au nombre de créatures qu’il contrôle.
El total de vida de cada jugador es el número de criaturas que controle.
Die Lebenspunktzahl jedes Spielers ist gleich der Anzahl der Kreaturen, die er kontrolliert.
I punti vita di ogni giocatore diventano pari al numero di creature che controlla.
各プレイヤーのライフの総量は、そのプレイヤーがコントロールするクリーチャーの総数に等しくなる。
각 플레이어의 생명 총점은 자신이 조종하는 생물의 개수가 된다.
Количество жизней каждого игрока становится равным количеству существ под его контролем.
O total de pontos de vida de cada jogador torna-se igual ao número de criaturas que ele controla.
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local number_of_teams = MTG():GetNumberOfTeams() local filter = Object():GetFilter() for i = 0,(number_of_teams-1) do local nth_team = MTG():GetNthTeam(i) local number_of_players_on_team = nth_team:GetNumberOfPlayers() if (nth_team:IsSharedLifeTotal() == 1) then local max_creatures = 0 for j=0,(number_of_players_on_team-1) do local nth_player_on_team = nth_team:GetNthPlayer(j) filter:Clear() filter:NotTargetted() filter:SetPlayer( nth_player_on_team ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) local total = filter:Count() if total > max_creatures then max_creatures = total end end nth_team:GetNthPlayer(0):SetLifeTotal(max_creatures) else for k=0,(number_of_players_on_team-1) do local nth_player_on_team = nth_team:GetNthPlayer(k) filter:Clear() filter:NotTargetted() filter:SetPlayer( nth_player_on_team ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) local total = filter:Count() nth_player_on_team:SetLifeTotal( total ) end end end
